projects.title: Nunjucks Templating
projects.intro: Nunjucks is a rich and powerful templating language. Drawing inspiration from jinja2, Nunjucks utilizes JavaScript to provide flexibility for a standard development environment of HTML.

projects.title: Gulp Workflow
projects.intro: Gulp.js is a streaming build system that can optimize a web development workflow. This will save countless time that would have been spent on meaningless tasks and hair pulling inefficiencies.
